name: Camo, A Jungle Rescue
description:
Camo, A Jungle Rescue is a 2D platformer where you play as Camo who is traversing the jungle in order to rescue his son. Fight and hide from birds and dangerous plants whilst eating bugs to keep you going in this jungle rescue.

Credits
  • Alicja Mrozek - Producer, Character Artist
  • Amber Berwick - Animation, General Artist
  • Conner Ord - Narrative designer, UI, QA
  • Hannah McLaughlin - Level Designer, UI, QA
  • Jasper van Diepen - Character Artist
  • Evalyna Potticary - Audio Designer
  • Kieran Milligan - Animation, Environment Artist
  • Kayla Wallace - Programmer
